name: Calipsa
slogan: Deep learning powered false alarm filter for security monitoring
description:
With a mission to improve the detection and prevention of crime, Calipsa's cloud-based False Alarm Filtering Platform uses deep learning technology to filter out over 85% of CCTV false alarms. Calipsa recognises the cause of an alarm, filtering out those that are not caused by human of vehicle motion - anything from a spider, to foliage, or the weather - forwarding only genuine alarms to human operators to review.

As leaders in false alarm reduction, Calipsa is revolutionising false alarm management and video monitoring efficiency for security monitoring companies, integrators and installers.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Mohammad Rashid
team.bioHtml: Co-founder @Calipsa.io . Entrepreneur First (2016) Postgrad in ML at @University of Cambridge. Previously @Symantec @Accenture @Wonga

jobs.title: Head of Machine Learning
jobs.description:
We are looking for an experienced Head of Machine Learning to take complete ownership of Calipsa's data science team, processes and development. 
 
You will be responsible for the core value of our product, collaborating with a team of engineers and researchers from varying backgrounds in order to achieve world-class performance. Due to the deep technical nature of the job, we expect you to be quite hands-on with an advanced knowledge of machine learning not only from a theoretical point of view, but also from a practical perspective. Your experience in the field should be mature enough to provide useful guidance and feedback to the team.


Technical skills:

Advanced knowledge of deep learning
Best practices in data processing/cleaning
Computer vision (nice to have)

Technical stack:

Python
Tensorflow
TF-serving

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
About us: 
Calipsa aims at detecting and preventing crime. We are building a cloud based solution that connects with CCTV cameras in order to understand and flag any anomalies.

Founded three years ago, we have customers in four different country and we are growing at 30% month on month. We are looking for a senior full stack engineer to be part of this journey. For more info about the company, please see our website www.calipsa.io

Culture: 
- Iterate fast - get it done mindset 
- everything is possible attitude 
- honest & transparent 
- collaborative

Role description:
- You will lead the software infrastructure team and design and develop scalable systems and processes to support our growth
- You will be responsible for the security of the software infrastructure, ensuring compliance with industry standards
- You will be the connecting point between the various software engineering teams ensuring deployment of new changes to production environments
- You will create, maintain and test recovery of our software systems (backup, restore, infrastructure and automation)
- You will lead troubleshooting and resolution of issues throughout the product life cycle including out of hours support for incident resolution

Essential requirements:
- Minimum 5 years experience working within engineering teams with some experience as a team lead
- Deep understanding of Linux/Unix environment
- Fluency with TCP/IP stack and network design (TCP/IP, HTTP(S), iptables)
- Experience with mass configuration management toolkit (Chef, Puppet, Ansible) - Understanding of technical security and risk mitigation
- Docker
- Google and Amazon web services

Important information:

We are based in London and ask applicants to be based here 
Please provide your github account alongside your CV to boris.ploix@calipsa.io

jobs.title: Senior Web Designer
jobs.description:
Calipsa aims at detecting and preventing crime. We are building a cloud based solution that connects with CCTV cameras in order to understand and flag any anomalies.

Founded three years ago, we have customers in four different country and we are growing at 30% month on month. We are looking for a senior full stack engineer to be part of this journey. For more info about the company, please see our website www.calipsa.io

Culture: 
- Iterate fast - get it done mindset 
- Everything is possible attitude 
- Honest & transparent 
- Collaborative

Role description:
- You will own the design and development of Calipsa web interfaces
- You will design the web-pages end-to-end: including managing content, testing website interactions and customise the user experience
- You will A/B test different updates and liaise with customers

Essential requirements:
- Minimum 2 years professional experience in web design
- Design-oriented university degree
- Advanced in visual design applications, i.e. Sketch, Adobe Creative Suites, etc.
- Prototyping skills with Invision or Marvel
- Thorough understanding of Agile methodology and tools such as Jira and Confluence
- Thorough understanding of user experience principles
- Engaging and charismatic, willingness to meet with customers

Important information:
We are based in London and ask applicants to be based here 
Please provide your github account alongside your CV to boris.ploix@calipsa.io
